VIVIDIVA

Introduction

Honey Apple is a South Korean singer, freelance model, and tour guide under Local High Records. Under the stage name Ha.L, which means angel of heaven, she is a former member of the girl group VIVIDIVA. She made her solo debut on November 9, 2017, with the digital single "42".
